The first graphic adventure by Tim Schafer in sixteen years, Broken Age began
two years ago in a historic, record-breaking Kickstarter campaign. Now it's
here in all its beautiful, 2D, hand-painted glory, with an original
orchestral soundtrack and an all-star vocal cast
